### [Padding Modes](/documentation/Accelerate/BNNSPaddingMode/init(rawValue:)#Padding-Modes)

[`init(UInt32)`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmode/init(_:))[`var rawValue: UInt32`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmode/rawvalue)[`var BNNSPaddingModeConstant: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodeconstant)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area with a specified constant.[`var BNNSPaddingModeReflect: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodereflect)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an odd-symmetric pattern.[`var BNNSPaddingModeSymmetric: BNNSPaddingMode`](/documentation/accelerate/bnnspaddingmodesymmetric)A constant that indicates that a padding operation fills the padded area to form an even-symmetric pattern.
